I understand what politics is about-- I know how you can go after one another, and that's good. But I think this goes too far, and I think it has made the John McCain campaign look a little narrow. It's not what the American people are looking for, he said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible Barack Obamaial candidate himself.
